summary: Add a live audio input-level (VU meter) indicator to the recording UI and remove the waveform visualization, providing real-time feedback that audio is being captured while keeping the rest of the recording functionality unchanged.
known_issues: During recording, the waveform display appears black/empty so users cannot see that audio input is being received.

existing_features.title: Remove the waveform visualization from the recording UI so users no longer see an empty/black waveform area while recording.
Ensure a clearly visible, real-time input level (VU meter) is shown during recording and reliably updates in response to incoming microphone audio.
Remove waveform-related state/logic from the audio recording hook and component interfaces so the app no longer computes or stores waveform samples.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a real-time audio input level (VU meter) to the recording interface and remove/disable the waveform visualization entirely.

projectName: Add reliable live VU meter feedback during recording and remove waveform visualization
